title: Best Spec for a everyday player
body: What's the best Specs I should be running if I am looking for a high fps and low ms? The computer i have right now runs league at 12fps and 80-100ms. I find myself showing up to champ select half way into bans. Sometimes I finally load into games and it's already started. I was wondering what I should be looking for when I get a new computer. I'm looking for 100fps if possible. (I plan on getting a laptop to take with me and play league wherever I go) Thanks for the help in advance. <3

replies.body: That's really up to you and your own preferences.  I couldn't tell you what to use, but what I can offer is our [recommended specs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements) guide which can help select some gear best fit for you.  In the meantime you can also use the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune up your current FPS which includes steps like updating drivers too.  I hope that helps!

Recommended will do, thank you for the help.

- Have a Good Day
